response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and potential impact on your business, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $900,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in the product's ability to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Should you decide to proceed, I am confident that this investment will pay off handsomely for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information about the product.", "product_price": 900000}
